The java API can publish and subscribe to messages over UDP. The messages can be exchanged between .NET and java. PGM is not supported.

=Publishing= 

{{{
TopicPublisherImpl pub = new TopicPublisherImpl("224.0.0.23", 8001,
				1024 * 64);
pub.start();
String msg = "Hello world";
pub.publish("test", msg.getBytes());
}}}

=Subscribing=
 
{{{
TopicSubscriberImpl sub = new TopicSubscriberImpl(address, port,
				64 * 1024);
sub.start();
while (true) {
	Iterator<Message> iter = sub.readNext();
	while (iter.hasNext()) {
		Message msg = iter.next();
		// process msg
	}
}
}}}
